<script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
        var dataConclusao = "#form.conclusao_procu.data_conclusao[{form.processos_procu.conclusao}]#";
        $("input[id*=data_conclusao]").attr('readonly', 'readonly');
        if(dataConclusao != ''){
            $("input[id*=data_conclusao]").datepicker("setDate", new Date(dataConclusao) );
        }
        $("input[id*=data_conclusao]").datepicker('disable');
        $("a.close-icon").css('display','none');
        
        var nWfAgenda = "#form.agendamento_procu.n_wf_agendamento[{form.processos_procu.agendamento}]#";
        $("input[id*=n_wf_agenda]").val(nWfAgenda);
        
        
        //Verificar Data de Outorga para iniciar sla
        
        ultimoAto();
        
        
    });
    
    
    function ultimoAto(){
        
        var idSubProcesso = "#assignment.processId#";
        $.ajax({
            type:"GET",
            url: "/jw/api/list/list_atos_dia_procu?processId="+ idSubProcesso,
            headers:{
                "api_id": "#envVariable.apiIdComunicacaoMediaView#",
                "api_key": "#envVariable.apiKeyComunicacaoMediaView#",
                "Accept":"application/json",
                "Content-Type": "application/json"
            },
            success: function(response){
                console.log("AAAAAAAAA"+response.size);
                if(response.size == 0){
                    //iniciarSLA();
                }
                
            }
              
          });
        
        
        
    }
    
    
    function verificarSLA(){
         var idSubProcesso = "#assignment.processId#";
          $.ajax({
            type:"GET",
            url: "/jw/api/list/listSLA?id_processo="+idSubProcesso+"&estado_atividade=Em%20curso",
            headers:{
                "api_id": "#envVariable.apiIdAtualizarCampos#",
                "api_key": "#envVariable.apiKeyAtualizarCampos#",
                "Accept":"application/json",
                "Content-Type": "application/json"
            },
            success: function(response){
                console.log("AAAAAAAAA"+response.size);
                if(response.size == 0){
                    iniciarSLA();
                }
                
            }
              
          });
    }
    
    function iniciarSLA(){
        var dataUltimaEntrada = $("input[id*=data_entrada]").datepicker( "getDate" );
        var date = new Date(dataUltimaEntrada);
        var dataUltimaEntradaBd = "#form.detalhe_proce_procu.data_entrada[{form.processos_procu.detalhe_processo}]#";
        var date2 = new Date(dataUltimaEntradaBd);
        

        if(date.getTime() !== date2.getTime()){
            
            
                    
            
        }
    }
    
    
</script>
